entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 4:55 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: E 68 km/h gust 100 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
